entry.title: 6D object pose estimation based on YOLO6d

link.title: 6D object pose estimation based on YOLO6d

entry.content:
The video above demonstrates yolo6d-based 6D pose estimation, where the projection of the 3D bbox is shown in green.

Key-inside

  • YOLO
  • EPnP algorithm
  • Opencv
  • Aruco
  • Pinhole camera model
  • Rigid Object 6D pose description

Reference

  • Yolo6D: paper, source code
entry.summary: The video above demonstrates yolo6d-based 6D pose estimation, where the projection of the 3D bbox is shown in green.
